function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contractors suffering a loss of income due to payment suspension during MCO","Impact":"Financial strain and inability to cover operating costs","Mitigation":"Diversifying income sources, reducing overhead expenses","Technologies":"Financial management software, cost-cutting tools","People":"Contractors, construction firms","Owner":"Contractors, financial advisors"},{"Description":"Decline in national economy leads to reduced job opportunities for contractors","Impact":"Decreased income and financial instability","Mitigation":"Investing in diversified projects, seeking government support","Technologies":"Project management software, government grant platforms","People":"Contractors, government agencies","Owner":"Contractors, government authorities"},{"Description":"Labor shortage and delay in materials supply due to COVID-19 impact","Impact":"Project delays and decreased productivity","Mitigation":"Developing flexible project timelines, sourcing alternative suppliers","Technologies":"Project management tools, supply chain management software","People":"Contractors, construction firms","Owner":"Contractors, project managers"}]}
